#Text=The San Antonio Spurs ( 45 - 8 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 23 - 29 ) 98 - 96 on Wednesday .
#Text=It appeared to be business as usual for the Spurs through the game 's first 12 minutes , as they held a 29 - 23 lead over the underdog Magic after one period .
#Text=Things turned quickly in the middle portion of the game however , as Orlando surprisingly outscored San Antonio 56 - 38 over the second and third quarter .
#Text=The visitors finally snapped back to life on both sides of the ball early in the fourth period , after falling behind by a margin of 81 - 67 with only 10:22 left in the game .
#Text=The Spurs crawled their way back through the efforts of Kawhi Leonard , Danny Green , Patty Mills and LaMarcus Aldridge , with the foursome scoring the team 's final 31 points .

#Text=With San Antonio finally holding a 96 - 93 lead with with 15 seconds left , Evan Fournier drained a clutch three - point shot for Orlando to knot the game up at 96 , their first points since the 3:9 mark of the fourth quarter .
#Text=However , Leonard insured the valiant comeback was n't in vain , draining a 19 - foot shot with 1 seconds left to give his team the 98 - 96 advantage .
#Text=One very anxious moment remained , as Evan Fournier alertly found Elfrid Payton roaming free downcourt on the subsequent inbound pass .
#Text=Payton attempted a desperation layup that banked too hard off the backboard and fell harmlessly to the floor , sending the Spurs home winners .
#Text=San Antonio was led by Leonard 's 29 points , to which he added seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block .
#Text=Aldridge was next with 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks .
#Text=Green contributed 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block .
#Text=Tim Duncan notably returned from a multi - game absence and pitched in with five points , seven rebounds , five assists and three blocks .
#Text=Mills was outstanding in pacing the reserves with 17 points , seven assists , six rebounds , two steals and a block .
#Text=It was rare stat - sheet - stuffing performance for the normally scoring - dependent point guard .
#Text=The Spurs remain comfortably atop the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .
#Text=They 're back in action after the All-Star break on Thursday , February 18th in Los Angeles against the Clippers .
#Text=Orlando 's attack was spearheaded by Fournier 's 28 - point explosion , which was complemented with five assists and a pair of rebounds .
#Text=Nikola Vucevic managed an impressive double - double against one of the toughest frontcourts in the league , tallying 20 points , 13 rebounds , five assists , a steal and a pair of blocks .
#Text=Victor Oladipo collected 14 points , three rebounds , an assist and a pair of steals .
#Text=Payton had a solid game other than his untimely miss , posting 13 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals .

#Text=Aaron Gordon was the only member of the starting five with single - digit scoring ( four points ) , but hauled in 14 rebounds , dished out three assists , recorded a steal and posted two blocks .
#Text=Rookie Mario Hezonja had another strong game in a reserve role , pacing the bench with 12 points , an assist and a steal .
#Text=The Magic remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division .
#Text=They resume play after the All-Star break on Friday , February 19th at home against the Dallas Mavericks .
